entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom I’m sorry but I’m losing my faith in you. According to the graph, we should have never closed CA, and then we would have all died now. There’re still a lot of covid-19 carriers in CA, but you @GavinNewsom said it’s getting better. I just see there’s more risk.
